titles: The Jesuits justification, proving they died as innocent as the child unborn
author: Oldham, John, 1653-1683.
notes: Attributed to Oldham by NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Imprint suggested by NUC pre-1956 imprints.
With ms. correction in next to last line and ms. note at head "by Dr. Peter Chamberlen."
Reproductions of originals in the Harvard University Library and British Library.
